summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsGive BackPowered by fermented soybean, Mixsoon’s Bean Essence is a cult-favorite K-Beauty essence that smooths texture, brightens dullness, and floods skin with long-lasting hydration. This lightweight, vegan formula gently exfoliates while strengthening the skin barrier for dewy, plump glass skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsInstantly boosts hydration for a dewy, glass skin glowRefines texture and smooths rough patches with gentle fermented exfoliationStrengthens the skin barrier to protect and lock in moistureSoftens the look of fine lines and early signs of agingPrimes skin to absorb serums and moisturizers more effectivelyFragrance-free and alcohol-freeKey IngredientsSoybean Ferment – Strengthens the skin barrier, floods skin with moisture, and smooths signs of aging.Barley Ferment – Delivers deep hydration, soothes redness, and boosts skin’s bounce and firmness.Pomegranate Ferment – Packed with antioxidants to combat fine lines and early aging.Korean Pear Ferment – Brightens dull skin and visibly fades dark spots.Item 2643835How To UseYou can use this essence in two ways:How to Use as an Exfoliant: Prep your face with warm water. Gently massage your skin in a circular motion. Rinse off the dead skin cells with the toner or Mixsoon facial essence.For Daily Use: Following the toner step apply an appropriate amount of the essence onto the face. Gently massage in for 3-5 mins until fully absorbed.IngredientsWater, Propanediol, Glycerin, Lactobacillus/Soybean Ferment Extract, Lactobacillus/Punica Granatum Fruit Ferment Extract, Saccharomyces/Barley Seed Ferment Filtrate, Lactobacillus/Pear Juice Ferment Filtrate.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details

reviews.headline: Amazing glass glow
reviews.comments: I first purchased this a couple of years ago from Korea and i'm so excited that Ulta now carries it! Great for my sensitive skin. Gently exfoliating, hydrated glass glow skin.

reviews.headline: Staple
reviews.comments: I use this everyday and i love it, originally i used to see people say that it was an exfoliant. But for me i use it to moisturize my face usually gets dry easily and my pores show but not with this product.

faceoff_positive.comments: I have acne-prone skin and was cautious about introducing new products into my routine. However, Mixsoon Bean Essence has been a pleasant surprise. Its lightweight and slightly sticky texture absorbs well, leaving my skin feeling hydrated without any irritation or breakouts. Over time, I've noticed a significant improvement in my skin's texture. The dryness and flakiness I usually experience during winter have diminished, giving way to smoother and more radiant skin. The added vitamins in the formula seem to aid in fading acne scars, contributing to a more even complexion.Overall, Mixsoon Bean Essence has become a staple in my skincare routine, providing hydration and gentle exfoliation without compromising my skin's sensitivity.
faceoff_positive.headline: Bean Essence
